## 1. Financial Aid Applications and Awards
***

```{r 1.2.1}
ft_aid_apps <- flextable(dt01_aid 
  ) %>%
  set_header_labels(
    'Student.Aid.Applicants' = "Institution",
    undergrad                = "Fall Undergrad Enrollment",
    grad                     = "# of Pell Recipients",
    tot_curr                 = "% With Pell Grant",
    tot_prev                 = "Tot Dollars Received",
    pct_chg                  = "Average Award"
  ) %>%
  colformat_num(
    j                  = 2:5,
    big.mark           = ",", 
    digits             = 0, 
    na_str             = "", 
    prefix             = ""
  ) %>%
    colformat_num(
    i                  = 5,
    digits             = 2, 
    na_str             = "", 
    suffix             = "%"
  ) %>%    
  colformat_num(
    j                  = 6,
    digits             = 2, 
    na_str             = "", 
    suffix             = "%"
  ) %>%    
  # colformat_num(
```
